title: Cisco Systems Founded
overview: Cisco Systems is founded in San Francisco, pioneering the development of commercial multiprotocol routers and shaping the networking hardware industry.

title: Netgear Roots
overview: Netgear’s early products for Ethernet and consumer networking lay the foundation for one of the most recognized home and SMB networking brands.

title: Juniper Networks Founded
overview: Juniper Networks is founded, focusing on high-performance core routers that challenge Cisco’s dominance in backbone infrastructure.

title: Check Point Software Founded
overview: Check Point pioneers the commercial firewall appliance market, contributing to enterprise security and network perimeter defense.

title: F5 Networks Founded
overview: F5 Networks emerges, delivering load balancers and application delivery controllers (ADCs) to improve scalability and performance of Internet services.

title: Huawei Expands Internationally
overview: Huawei, founded in 1987, expands globally by 1999, becoming a major player in telecommunications and networking infrastructure.

title: Arista Networks Founded
overview: Arista Networks is founded, introducing cloud data center switches with high port density and low latency, defining modern leaf-spine fabrics.

title: Ubiquiti Networks Emerges
overview: Ubiquiti enters the market with low-cost, high-performance wireless and routing equipment, popular in ISPs, SMBs, and communities worldwide.

title: Open Compute Project
overview: Facebook launches the Open Compute Project to share open hardware designs for servers, switches, and data centers, shifting vendor ecosystems.

title: Edgecore Switches in Open Networking
overview: Edgecore and other vendors popularize open whitebox switches, separating hardware from network OS and accelerating SDN adoption.

title: Barefoot Networks and P4
overview: Barefoot introduces programmable Tofino chips and the P4 language, enabling fully software-defined packet processing at line rate.

title: NVIDIA Acquires Mellanox
overview: NVIDIA acquires Mellanox, strengthening its position in HPC, AI clusters, and Ethernet/InfiniBand backbone hardware.
